summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 5724 for the improvement of 55th Avenue South, from Ferdinand Street to Hudson Street; by constructing sewers and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 75571, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
